src:
Inter Milan Batal Rekrut Nemanja Matic?
04 Nov 2019, 18:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rumor kepindahan Nemanja Matic ke Inter Milan nampaknya tidak akan terwujud. Raksasa Serie A itu diberitakan menarik diri dari perburuan sang bek.
Sudah menjadi rahasia umum jika Inter Milan tengah mengincar gelandang bertahan baru. Antonio Conte diberitakan tidak puas dengan kualitas gelandang bertahan Inter saat ini, sehingga ia ingin merekrut pemain baru.
Nama yang kerap didengungkan menjadi target transfer Conte adalah Nemanja Matic. Gelandang milik Manchester United itu merupakan mantan anak asuh Conte di Chelsea, dan Conte sangat menyukai gaya bermainnya.
Namun Corriere Dello Sport mengklaim bahwa transfer itu tidak akan terjadi. Inter disebut sudah membatalkan rencana mereka untuk merekrut pemain asal Serbia itu.

Mengapa Inter batal merekrut Matic? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Inter Milan Cancel Recruit Nemanja Matic?
Nov 04 2019, 18:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rumors of moving Nemanja Matic to Inter Milan are unlikely to materialize. The Serie A giant is reportedly withdrawing from the hunt for the defender.
It is common knowledge that Inter Milan are eyeing a new defensive midfielder. Antonio Conte is reportedly dissatisfied with the quality of Inter's current midfielder, so he wants to recruit new players.
The name that is often touted as Conte's transfer target is Nemanja Matic. The Manchester United midfielder is Conte's former foster child at Chelsea, and Conte really likes his playing style.
But Corriere Dello Sport claims that the transfer will not take place. Inter are said to have canceled their plans to recruit the Serbian player.

Why did Inter cancel signing Matic? Check out the information below.
